import "./post.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData"; function post(props) { const [like, setLike] = useState(props.postData.like); var userdetail=Users.filter(a_user=>a_user.id===props.postData.userId)[0]; console.log(userdetail); return (
{userdetail.username} {props.postData.date}
{props?.postData.desc}
{} people like it
{props.postData.comment} comments
) } export default post
